Text: D1NZ:  It began early in 2003 as a small competition consisting of several drifting teams from all over the country in order to organise and regulate Drifting events on the circuit.

<Text: D1NZ:  Organizers aim to promote and educate Drifting in New Zealand, with a regulated safe environment.>

Text: D1NZ:  It has been recognised as the longest running drifting series in the world.
